Licensee's use of the VU IP Rights shall be strictly limited to the discharge of its responsibility to provide services to the United States government and for no other purpose.

Licensee acknowledges and understands that if the United States government (through any of its agencies or otherwise) has funded research, during the course of or under which any "subject inventions" are conceived or made, the United States government is entitled, as of right, under the provisions of 35 U.S.C. Sections 200-212 and applicable regulations of Chapter 37 of the Code of Federal Regulations, to a nonexclusive, nontransferable, irrevocable, paid-up license to practice or have practiced such "subject invention" for governmental purposes.Any license granted to Licensee in this License shall be subject to such right.
